headline: Private-Equity Stocks Have Gotten Crushed. J.P. Morgan Says This One Is a Buy.
summary: Investors have grown skeptical when it comes to the stock of private asset managers.  It has been a rough year for shares of private asset firms and other alternative money managers.  The private-equity business, once the industry’s bread-and-butter, has slowed as firms have struggled to cash out of companies they have bought and distribute money to investors.

headline: Without data centers, GDP growth was 0.1% in the first half of 2025, Harvard economist says
summary: Is a U.S. without data centers a country without GDP growth?

headline: Apollo Global Management (APO): Assessing Valuation After Recent Share Price Movement and Analyst Forecasts
summary: Apollo Global Management (APO) shares have seen some movement recently, as investors evaluate the firm’s latest quarterly figures and what they might signal for the financial sector. Short-term performance remains mixed compared to the past year’s returns. See our latest analysis for Apollo Global Management.
